choices: Throw something at the girls in the front row
11.content: You are sitting in your math class feeling bored while Mr King is droning on about hypotenuses and right angles.
11.title: Daniel, a disruptive boy

choices: Skip the rest of the day
111.content:
You throw your eraser and hit Kate in the back of the head.

"Ow!" she complains and turns to glare at you. She knows exactly who is responsible.

"Kate!" Mr King says abruptly. "Are you paying attention."

"Yes Mr King." she replies. "Daniel is throwing stuff at me."

"Am not." you say.

"Then whose eraser is this?" Kate picks up the projectile and hands it to the teacher.

"Not mine." you insist.

"I suppose it's just a coincidence that it has your name on it." Mr King says sarcastically. "Go to the principal's office. I'll call ahead and tell him to expect you."

You bow to your fellow students as you leave.
111.title: Throw something at the girls in the front row

choices: Make a joke and change the subject
1111.content:
"Come in." Mr Collins calls through his office door.

You push the door open and enter his office, Doing your best to maintain your bravado.

"Sit down." he directs, pulling a file, probably yours, out of a drawer and sitting in his own large leather chair.

"Daniel." He says, barely looking up from the file. "You seem to spend more time in my office than in class."

You are about to make a smart-assed response when he continues.

"This school is preparing to implement a new programme for dealing with students who insist on disrupting the learning of their fellow students." He looks directly at you. "If you aren't careful you'll find yourself volunteering to be the first participant."

"Huh?" is all you can manage. "What are..."

"Now get back to class." he waves you out of his office.

The bell goes before you get back to maths so you wait in the usual spot to meet your friends for lunch.

"So how many weeks of detention did you get this time?" Stephen greets you as he arrives.

"None." you say.

"Really?" he asks. "How did you manage that?"
1111.title: Go to the principal's office

11112.content:
"Apparently I'm fully booked for detention for the next 3 years." You say. "Anyway, have you change your mind about the party?"

"No." Stephen says. "I'm not throwing a party while my parents are away. They'd murder me if they found out."

"They won't find out." you insist, but you already know it's a lost cause. Stephen is such a nerd.

"It's not going to happen." He states.

"What's not going to happen?" Kevin asks as he approaches with Peter.

"Stephens not going to grow any balls." you tell them. "So he's decided to start wearing dresses and playing with dolls."

He gives you a friendly shove and explains. "I'm not having a party while my parents are away."
11112.title: Make a joke and change the subject

111121.content:
"That's because you're a girl." You continue to tease, drawing an encouraging laugh from the others. "Just admit it Stephanie then we can ask Kate to paint your nails and do you hair so you're all pretty for the boys."

Stephen has finally had enough and he throws a punch. You are so surprised by this that you don't react in time and he hits you square on the jaw. "Shut up. You fag."

You respond by shoving him backward. He then charges at you but you catch him and wrestle him to the ground.

"Daniel." You hear Mrs Gibson's voice. "Get off of him right now."

You release Stephen and turn to see the stern middle-aged woman approaching. She ignore your insistence that Stephen started it as she takes you back to the principal.

"Well that was quick." Mr Collins once again looks across his desk at you. "It looks like you've just volunteered."

"Volunteered for what?" you ask. "What is going..."

"You'll find out soon enough." he says. "Once I've discussed it with your parents."

You have to wait in another room for you parents to come to the school and talk to Mr Collins. When the meeting is done they take you home.

"So what's going on?" you ask once you're in the car.

"You are being put in a special programme." your mother tells you.

"Yeah." you says. "I got that part. What is this programme."

"You'll find out when it starts." your father says, indicating that you won't be getting any more information out of them.

By the time you get home school would have let out. You wonder if Stephen is still mad at you.
111121.title: Keep teasing Stephen

choices: Tell him you were just sent home.
1111211.content:
You call Stephen.

"Hello?" he answers.

"Hi Stephen." you say. "It's Daniel."

"Oh." he doesn't sound too happy to hear your voice. "Hi."

"I'm sorry about today." you say. "I guess I took it too far."

"You think?" he asks sarcastically but seems to accept your apology. "So what happened? You didn't come to class after lunch."
1111211.title: Call Stephen

choices: Let her lead you to the bathroom
11112112.content:
"The principal sent me home." you say then ask. "Hey. wanna come over." hoping to ensure that he doesn't hold a grudge after your fight.

"You're allowed to have someone over?" he asks.

"I guess." you say. "My parents didn't ground me or anything."

"Okay." he says. "See you soon."

Stephen doesn't live far from you so he's there in a couple of minutes.

You play video games until dinner time. As usually happens when Daniel is over after school he stays for dinner.

You are surprised to find that your mother has made your favorite, spaghetti. You don't question it and just enjoy the meal.

"Want a re-match before I head home?" Stephen asks when you are both finished eating.

"Sure. I'll kick your butt this time." Is what you try to reply however all you manage is an incoherent babble.

Stephen looks at you, shocked. "What?" he asks.

You try again but get the same result. In a panic you try to stand but find your legs unsteady and fall to the floor.

"I'll get your parents." He says in a worried voice.

With some effort you manage to climb to your feet but then you feel another problem. You are wetting yourself. You look down at the growing dark patch between you legs and, distracted, lose your balance and fall on you bottom.

"I think you'd better go home." your mother tells Stephen when she sees you.

He is quickly ushered out the front door. You are expecting your parents to rush you to hospital but instead your mother says. "Come on let's get you into the bath. Then I think it's time for bed."

You try to argue but, again, only babble like a baby.

She takes your hand and helps you up off the floor. "I didn't expect it to work that quickly."
11112112.title: Tell him you were just sent home.

111121121.content:
You can barely walk. What hope do you have of getting away? Maybe if you cooperate this will be over quickly, whatever it is.

With your mother's help you stay upright all the way to the bathroom. There she starts filling the tub then removes your clothes. You haven't been naked in front of her for years. It's embarrassing but you doubt you have the coordination to undress and wash yourself at the moment.

Steadied by both of her hands, you step into the warm water and sit down. "Good boy." She says as she washes you then helps you back out of the tub before wrapping a towel around you and rubbing you dry.

She leads you to your room where you find, waiting on your bed, a large disposable diaper.

"What's that for?" you try to ask, temporarily forgetting your inability to speak.

"You're going to be in diapers all the time now." she explains, guessing what you were trying to ask. She unwraps the towel from your body. "Now be a good boy and lay down so I can put it on you."
111121121.title: Let her lead you to the bathroom

1111211211.content:
You obey and lay on top of the unfolded diaper. Your mother pulls the front up firmly between your legs and tapes you into it. "If you'd been this cooperative before you would have avoided all this." She tells you as she dresses you in your pajamas and tucks you in.

"Goodnight." she tells you and then kisses you on the forehead before turning off the light and leaving.
1111211211.title: Lay down on the diaper

11112112111.content:
Closing your eyes, you eventually fall asleep.

You wake up early and realise that your diaper is soaked.
11112112111.title: Sleep

111121121112.content:
You get out of bed and find your legs just as unstable as they were last night. After a few unstable steps you decide to crawl instead. As humiliating as it is, even without anyone there to see you, you make much better progress.

You start to make your way out to the living room when you get a familiar feeling in your gut. You're going to need to poop soon. Without really thinking about it, you head toward the toilet but you don't make it far before you start involuntarily filling the seat of your diaper.

You freeze on the spot as the mess spreads across your backside. Once you are finished, you don't know what to do. With even the smallest movement you can feel it squash against your skin.
111121121112.title: Get out of bed

choices: Refuse to be dressed for school
1111211211121.content:
You call out and manage an infantile "ma-ma".

The embarrassment is finally too much as you realise that you are crawling around on the floor like a baby in a messy diaper and calling out for your mommy to change you.

You begin to cry. By the time your mother finds you, you are laying on your side sobbing uncontrollably.

"Don't worry Danny." she reassures you as she helps you up and pulls you into a reassuring hug. "I'll get you changed into a nice clean diaper."

She leads you back to your room and lays a plastic mat on the floor. Next she removes your pajamas and lays you on the mat.

Carefully untaping the full diaper. she pulls it open between your legs and begins the work of cleaning your bottom with baby wipes.

She soon has you clean and rediapered. "There." she says, helping you up. "Doesn't that feel better?"

You nod.

Then she takes out your school uniform.

You try to argue that you cant' go to school like this but fail to produce a single comprehensible word.
1111211211121.title: Call for your mother

11112112111211.content:
You reluctantly allow your mother to dress you for school then she leads you out to the dining table. She brings you a bowl of some mushy fruit-flavoured stuff.

"I'm afraid you're on baby-food." she explains as she begins to spoon-feed you. "Your principal warned us that you might not be able to chew properly."
11112112111211.title: Let your mother dress you

choices: Hide to avoid going to school
111121121112111.content:
You accept the strange-tasting mush. You are hungry and reason that eating baby food isn't the most embarrassing thing you've done this morning.

By the time you finish your father is up.

"Watch Daniel while I get ready." she tells him, sitting you on the floor in front of the TV.
111121121112111.title: Let her feed you

1111211211121112.content: You glance back at your father, he is focused on his newspaper, so you crawl out of the living room.
1111211211121112.title: Hide to avoid going to school

choices: Stay hidden in your wet diaper
11112112111211122.content:
You crawl to the rarely-used guest room. Under the bed are boxes, whose contents was forgotten a long time ago. You manage to crawl into a gap between them and wait.

You hear your parents searching for you. It seems you've picked an effective hiding spot because they don;t look here.

You don't know how long you've been under the bed but you begin to feel yourself wetting yourself. The warm liquid floods the front of the diaper then then padding begins to absorb it, leaving the diaper heavy and uncomfortable.
11112112111211122.title: Hide inside

111121121112111221.content:
Despite your discomfort, you don't want to give up your location. So you lay there until you eventually fall asleep.

You are woken by your mother moving boxes to get to you. "You had me so worried." she says. "Get out from under there."

Discovered, you give up and crawl out from your hiding spot. Your mother gives you a smack across your diapered bottom once it becomes accessible. "Don't run off again." Then, hearing the wet noise your diaper makes, "It looks like you need a change too."

She helps you to your feed and leads you, waddling, back to your room where she changes you into a fresh diaper.

"It's far too late to take you to school now." she says, pulling your pants back up. In your mind you celebrate this small victory until she adds "But don't think that means you've saved yourself any embarrassment."

Your heart begins to race as you wonder what she might have in store for you. You aren't held in suspense very long.

"I need to go shopping." she says. "And I can't leave you here unsupervised." She takes your hand and begins leading you out the front door.
111121121112111221.title: Stay hidden in your wet diaper

choices: Insist that you don't have the mind of a toddler
1111211211121112212.content:
"No!" you almost completely fail to say, pulling your hand free.

Unfortunately the momentum makes you fall over. You get up of your hands and knees and try to crawl away but your mother easily catches you.

She pulls you back to your bed where she pulls your pants down to your ankles. Then she sits on the bed and positions you over her knee. She pulls the back of your diaper down, exposing your bottom. "You will do as you are told." she says as she begins to spank you.

The fist slap hurts but not too bad. However, each time your mother's hand lands on your bare bottom it leaves you more sensitive to the next. Before long the pain is intolerable and, for the second time today, you being to cry like a baby.

Satisfied that she's made her point, she pulls your diaper back up over your throbbing bottom. She then stands you back up and pulls your pants back up. She leads you, still sobbing, out to the car and clips you into the back seat.

You are surprised when, after a short drive, your mother parks. Not in the shopping centre carpark but in front of the house of her friend, Mrs Harris. She unclips you and helps you out of the car before leading you to the front door.

"Hello Louise." Mrs Harris greets your mother. "Hello Daniel" she says in a tone reserved for small children.

"Hi Rachel." Your mother replies. "I'm sorry to just show up like this but he wouldn't go to school this morning and then when I tried to take him shopping with me he threw a tantrum. Could you please look after him for a little while?"

"Sure." The woman replies. "I'm happy to help, and take all the time you need. Kate can help me look after him."

Your heart sinks as you remember, Kate, the girl you love to torment in class is Mrs Harris's daughter.

"Are you sure it's no trouble?" your mother asks, although she hands a large bag to Mrs Harris as she does.

"No trouble." Mrs Harris says. "So do the doctors have any idea what's wrong with him?"

"No." your mother lies to her friend. "He just fainted and when he woke up it was like he had the mind of a toddler."
1111211211121112212.title: Try to get away

11112112111211122121.content:
You try to argue but don't actually manage to say anything coherent.

However your angry babbling gets Mrs Harris's attention. "What?"

"He seems a little grumpy today." your mother diverts her attention. "Maybe you should give him his bottle and put him down for a nap. He'll probably be in a better mood when he wakes up."

The women say their goodbyes and Mrs Harris leads you into a bedroom. "I keep this room set up for my niece who sleeps over sometimes." she explains. "But I'm sure she won't mind you taking a nap in here."

You look around. Her niece must be very young because everything is cutesy and pink.

Mrs Harris helps you climb under the bedcovers, which are decorated with Disney princesses, then takes a large baby-bottle from the bag your mother brought. "Here you go." she hand you the bottle before leaving you to your nap.
11112112111211122121.title: Insist that you don't have the mind of a to...

111121121112111221211.content:
You raise the nipple to your lips and begin sucking on it. It takes a bit of practice to get it working but you soon finish the whole bottle.

You lay there bored.
111121121112111221211.title: Drink the bottle

1111211211121112212112.content:
You have no idea where you would go, or how you might get there, if you got out of bed so you close your eyes and try to relax.

You wake up some time later with another wet diaper.
1111211211121112212112.title: Try to take a nap

choices: Hide to avoid going to school
111121121112112.content:
You clamp your mouth shut. You've done enough babyish things today. You're not going to eat baby food.

You end up with the goop smeaerd across your face ban manage to avoid swallowing more than the first mouthful, much to your mother's frustration.

She sighs and wipes your face clean with a damp cloth. "Fine. Go hungry."

By then your father is up.

"Watch Daniel while I get ready." she tells him, sitting you on the floor in front of the TV.
111121121112112.title: Refuse to eat baby food

1111211211121122.content: You glance back at your father, he is focused on his newspaper, so you crawl out of the living room.
1111211211121122.title: Hide to avoid going to school

choices: Stay hidden in your wet diaper
11112112111211222.content:
You crawl to the rarely-used guest room. Under the bed are boxes, whose contents was forgotten a long time ago. You manage to crawl into a gap between them and wait.

You hear your parents searching for you. It seems you've picked an effective hiding spot because they don;t look here.

You don't know how long you've been under the bed but you begin to feel yourself wetting yourself. The warm liquid floods the front of the diaper then then padding begins to absorb it, leaving the diaper heavy and uncomfortable.
11112112111211222.title: Hide inside

111121121112112221.content:
Despite your discomfort, you don't want to give up your location. So you lay there until you eventually fall asleep.

You are woken by your mother moving boxes to get to you. "You had me so worried." she says. "Get out from under there."

Discovered, you give up and crawl out from your hiding spot. Your mother gives you a smack across your diapered bottom once it becomes accessible. "Don't run off again." Then, hearing the wet noise your diaper makes, "It looks like you need a change too."

She helps you to your feed and leads you, waddling, back to your room where she changes you into a fresh diaper.

"It's far too late to take you to school now." she says, pulling your pants back up. In your mind you celebrate this small victory until she adds "But don't think that means you've saved yourself any embarrassment."

Your heart begins to race as you wonder what she might have in store for you. You aren't held in suspense very long.

"I need to go shopping." she says. "And I can't leave you here unsupervised." She takes your hand and begins leading you out the front door.
111121121112112221.title: Stay hidden in your wet diaper

choices: Insist that you don't have the mind of a toddler
1111211211121122212.content:
"No!" you mange to say, pulling your hand free.

Unfortunately the momentum makes you fall over. You get up of your hands and knees and try to crawl away but your mother easily catches you.

She pulls you back to your bed where she pulls your pants down to your ankles. Then she sits on the bed and positions you over her knee. She pulls the back of your diaper down, exposing your bottom. "You will do as you are told." she says as she begins to spank you.

The fist slap hurts but not too bad. However, each time your mother's hand lands on your bare bottom it leaves you more sensitive to the next. Before long the pain is intolerable and, for the second time today, you being to cry like a baby.

Satisfied that she's made her point, she pulls your diaper back up over your throbbing bottom. She then stands you back up and pulls your pants back up. She leads you, still sobbing, out to the car and clips you into the back seat.

You are surprised when, after a short drive, your mother parks. Not in the shopping centre carpark but in front of the house of her friend, Mrs Harris. She unclips you and helps you out of the car before leading you to the front door.

"Hello Louise." Mrs Harris greets your mother. "Hello Daniel" she says in a tone reserved for small children.

"Hi Rachel." Your mother replies. "I'm sorry to just show up like this but he wouldn't go to school this morning and then when I tried to take him shopping with me he threw a tantrum. Could you please look after him for a little while?"

"Sure." The woman replies. "I'm happy to help, and take all the time you need. Kate can help me look after him."

Your heart sinks as you remember, Kate, the girl you love to torment in class is Mrs Harris's daughter.

"Are you sure it's no trouble?" your mother asks, although she hands a large bag to Mrs Harris as she does.

"No trouble." Mrs Harris says. "So do the doctors have any idea what's wrong with him?"

"No." your mother lies to her friend. "He just fainted and when he woke up it was like he had the mind of a toddler."
1111211211121122212.title: Try to get away

11112112111211222121.content:
"No." You manage to say. "She lie." unfortunately the rest of your argument comes out as babbling.

However it gets Mrs Harris's attention. "What?"

"He seems a little grumpy today." your mother diverts her attention. "Maybe you should give him his bottle and put him down for a nap. He'll probably be in a better mood when he wakes up."

The women say their goodbyes and Mrs Harris leads you into a bedroom. "I keep this room set up for my niece who sleeps over sometimes." she explains. "But I'm sure she won't mind you taking a nap in here."

You look around. Her niece must be very young because everything is cutesy and pink.

Mrs Harris helps you climb under the bedcovers, which are decorated with Disney princesses, then takes a large baby-bottle from the bag your mother brought. "Here you go." she hand you the bottle before leaving you to your nap.

You are hungry but are you hungry enough to drink formula from a baby bottle?
11112112111211222121.title: Insist that you don't have the mind of a to...

111121121112112221212.content: You drop the bottle onto the floor and lay there, bored and hungry.
111121121112112221212.title: Leave the bottle

choices: Call out for Mrs Harris to help you
1111211211121122212122.content:
You have no idea where you would go, or how you might get there, if you got out of bed so you close your eyes and try to relax.

You wake up some time later with the feeling that you need to pee. Without even thinking, you get out of bed to find the toilet.

Your wobbly legs give way after a couple of steps and you land hard on he ground. The shock causes you to release a little pee into the diaper. As you get back up on your hands an knees you wonder why you haven't just wet yourself completely like before, not that you're complaining, but why?

Whatever your parents did to you must be wearing off.
1111211211121122212122.title: Try to take a nap

choices: Take the diaper off and go without underwear
11112112111211222121221.content:
Having regained control of your bladder your first priority is to get to the toilet before you wet your diaper again.

You crawl to the door and, balancing against the wall, manage to stand enough to open it. It's a short distance to the toilet, where you similarly let yourself in.

With a little difficulty, you manage to pull the diaper down and sit on the toilet. You guess that peeing like a girl is the safest option until you regain better control of your muscle.

When you are finished, you look down at the slightly used diaper around your knees and wonder what you should do.
11112112111211222121221.title: Crawl to the toilet

choices: Try to explain Mrs Harris your situation
11112112111211222121222.content:
Your figure out that your partens must have druged your food with a expertimental drug which is probably also in your baby bottle which means that you have to explain your situation to Mrs Harris before your mother comes back and force you to drink the baby bottle.

You decide to call out for Mrs Harris to help. you to your revieval your scream sounds now like the scream of a toddler instead of baby cries.

Soon you hear the noise of footsteps heading to your room.
11112112111211222121222.title: Call out for Mrs Harris to help you

1112.content:
The principal can expect you all he likes but you have no intention of listening to another lecture on proper behavior in class. Instead you just walk out of the school and head to the mall.

Sure, you're going to cop it when you get home but that was going to happen anyway. This way you get to at least enjoy the afternoon.

Eventually it's time to go home and face the music. To your surprise, your parents make no mention of your skipping class. Is it possible that the school didn't call? Maybe they didn't even notice.

You are surprised to find that your mother has made your favorite, spaghetti. You don't question it and just enjoy the meal. "Maybe I should skip class tomorrow too." you say to yourself.

Once you are finished, you stand up to head to your room but you find your legs rather wobbly. Your mother is nearby and notices you struggling to maintain balance. "Oh dear, I didn't expect it to work so quickly." She says, holding your hand to steady you.

"What do you mean?" is what you try to say. However, it comes out as incomprehensible babble.

"Come on." she says, gently leading you to your room. "Let's get you changed for bed."
1112.title: Skip the rest of the day

11121.content:
You can barely walk. What hope do you have of getting away? Maybe if you cooperate this will be over quickly, whatever it is.

With your mother's help you stay upright all the way to your bedroom. There she starts undressing you. You haven't been naked in front of her for years. It's embarrassing but you doubt you have the coordination to do it yourself right now.

She leaves you sitting, naked, on your bed for a moment while she goes to your wardrobe. When she returns she is unfolding a large disposable diaper.

"What's that for?" you try to ask, temporarily forgetting your inability to speak.

"You're going to be in diapers all the time now." she explains, guessing what you were trying to ask. She spreads the diaper out on the bed. "Now be a good boy and lay down so I can put it on you."
11121.title: Follow her

111211.content:
You obey and lay on top of the unfolded diaper. Your mother pulls the front up firmly between your legs and tapes you into it. "If you'd been this cooperative before you would have avoided all this." She tells you as she dresses you in your pajamas and tucks you in.

"Goodnight." she tells you and then kisses you on the forehead before turning off the light and leaving.

You lay awake, feeling the thick diaper between your legs and wondering what has been done to you and why? As you ponder this you begin to feel warm liquid trickling down between your legs and pooling at your bottom. You realise that you're wetting yourself.

The padding of the diaper quickly absorbs the pee, leaving your bottom merely damp but still uncomfortable.
111211.title: Lay on the diaper

choices: Call out to your mother again
1112112.content:
"Mom!" you try to call out, although it sounds more like a babyish. "Ma Ma." You blush as you realise how fitting that is since you're calling to alert her to your wet diaper.

She quickly arrives and turns on the light. "What is it?"

Not expecting an answer, she pulls back your covers and sticks a finger in the leg-hole of your diaper. "Yep." she says, "That's a wet diaper."

You wish you could just disappear into the mattress as she retrieves a dry diaper from your wardrobe, along with other supplies.

She removes your pajama pants then spreads a plastic mat under your soggy bottom before untaping the diaper and pulling it open. Your privates are quickly cleaned with baby wipes and taped into the fresh diaper.

"All done." your mother declares happily as she puts you back into your pajama pants. "See you in the morning." She turns the light back off and leaves.

You eventually fall asleep.

You wake up early and realise that your diaper is once again wet. Actually, this time it's soaked.
1112112.title: Call out for your mother

11121121.content:
"Ma ma" you call out again. You have to repeat it a few times but she eventually comes.

"Are you wet again?" she asks, once again checking your diaper. "Yep, Soaked. We might need to get you some thicker diapers for night time."

She changes your soggy diaper then leads you out of your room. "Let's get you some breakfast". She seats you at the dining table and goes to the kitchen.

She returns with a bowl of some mushy fruit-flavoured stuff.

"I'm afraid you're on baby-food." she explains as she begins to spoon-feed you. "Your principal warned us that you might not be able to chew properly."
11121121.title: Call out to your mother again

111211211.content:
You accept the strange-tasting mush. You are hungry and reason that eating baby food isn't the most embarrassing thing you've done this morning. In fact, that is just about to happen.

"Okay" Your mom declares, wiping your face to clean up the baby food that missed your mouth. "Let's get you dressed for school."

"School?" you fail to ask as she helps you up from the chair. However you have bigger problems moments later. The only warning is a slight discomfort in your stomach, then you find yourself pushing a load of poop into the seat of your diaper.

"What's wrong?" your mother notices that you're frozen on the spot. However the smell soon answers her question. "Oh. I was wondering when I'd have to deal with a poopy diaper." she again begins to lead you to your room. "Come on, let's get this over with."
111211211.title: Let her feed you

1112112111.content:
With each step you can feel the mess in your diaper squish against your bottom but you let your mother lead you to your room where she lays a plastic mat on the floor. Next she removes your pajamas and lays you on the mat.

Carefully untaping the full diaper. she pulls it open between your legs and begins the work of cleaning your bottom with baby wipes. ""

She soon has you clean and rediapered. "There." she says, helping you up. "That wasn't so bad?"

You nod.

Then she dresses you in your school uniform and leaves you in front of the TV to watch cartoons while she gets ready.

Soon enough you are in the back seat of your mother's car, on your way to school.

A feeling of dread builds as you look out the window at the other students arriving. Will they be able to tell that you are diapered? What if they try to talk to you?

Your mother gets out and opens your door then leads you by the hand out of the safety of the car and into the school. You do your best to walk normally but your wobbly legs betray you.

Staring at the ground you aren't sure if anyone is looking at you.

You arrive at a classroom. The door reads "Special Education - Room 2"

What? They've put you in special ed?

Your mother knocks on the door.
1112112111.title: Go with her

choices: Tell Miss Taylor that you are wet
11121121111.content:
A young woman opens the door.

"This must be Daniel." She lets you and your mother into the room. "I'm Miss Taylor. I'll be taking care of you."

You don't recognise Miss Taylor. She isn't the usual special ed teacher, and more strangely, there is no one else in the classroom.

After a few words, your mother leaves you in the care of Miss Taylor. She leads you over to a mat and sits you down.

"This will be your classroom from now on." she explains. "It is a special education classroom because the other students will be told that you have suffered brain damage and now have the mind of a toddler. However, you will not actually be with the intellectually disabled students. Your normal classes will continue with me."

You wonder how you can do anything in class when you can't even talk. You certainly don't think you'd be able to write.

Your question in answered when Miss Taylor lays a tablet computer in front of you. "You will complete your class work on this. The interface has been designed so that you can operate it with very little coordination."

And so your lessons begin. With little ability to misbehave you just do the work.

Sometime before recess you feel yourself wetting your diaper again.
11121121111.title: Go into the room

14.content:
Just before I fully awoke from a very troubled nap, I remembered how I came to be in the bizarre predicament you are about to read:

My 1st period instructor, Mr. Mathews, sent me to the vice principal’s office early in the day due to what he called dress-code violations. It wasn’t my first time for this, and the next step could be expulsion for me. Mom and Dad would KILL me if that happened.

But I know I’m hot, and that men can’t help but drool over me when I strut by, and I was pretty sure that I could sweet talk my way out of this little kerfuffle with just the right amount of cleavage and thigh. Especially since it was Vice Principal Hutchins I was seeing, who I’ve caught more than once eyeing me with those beady eyes of his.

So, a snooty receptionist told me to sit down on the big brown chair outside the vice principal’s office, and wait until he was ready to see me. As soon as I did, I felt a sharp pinprick and shot back up off the seat to my feet. An inspection of the worn fabric seating revealed a sharp tack! I stood and complained to the bitch of a receptionist, who totally ignored me while she spoke to someone on the phone.

While I stood there, glaring down at her across the desk, my hands on my hips, I began to feel a strange kind of woozy, warm feeling creep over me. My limbs took on a wobbly quality, and I became unsure of my balance. Still being ignored by the receptionist, I decided I’d better sit down in the chair again until the feeling passed.

And that’s all I remembered as I giggled my way awake thanks to fingers tickling the toes on my right foot. As I came to, I heard a man’s voice cooing down at me, “Aww, isn’t she a little dream! Naptime’s over now, Stacy. Time to wake up baby!”. My body reacted oddly to the fingers lightly touching my feet. I could only wobble my head around, and flail my limbs around in no particular direction. Like I’d lost much of my motor control!

With my eyes now fully open, I realized there was some sort of mesh netting surrounding me on all sides. Leering down at me over either side of what I deduced to be a sort of playpen were Vice Principal Hutchins and Mr. Mathews! Still feeling the tickling sensation, I looked down to realize Mr. Mathews was doing the tickling, and seemed to be enjoying himself immensely, “Oh, the fun we are going to have straightening you out, Stacy.”

I screamed as I began to realize more fully the impossible situation I was in. I was thinking, “Oh my God! This can’t really be happening, only it came out something closer to: Wuwaaaah! M’wah! M’wah! Eee! Hee-Hee! Weeheehahahaha!”.

“And you swear to me she and the others in this special program can comprehend what we’re saying, and will learn the course material in time for finals, Mr. Mathews?”, inquired the potentially skeptical Vice Principal Hutchins.

“You have my word on it, Mr. Hutchins. I promise to have this unruly brat turned round and ready to graduate with flying colors.”, assured Mr. Mathews.

“I must commend you on your dedication to the job, Mathews, and the sacrifice of your evenings tending to the education of your special test subjects.”

By now, I had jostled free of the tickling fingers of my teacher, and wobbled on elbows and knees as best I could across the soft fabric of the playpen I found myself trapped in, away from his hands. My head felt heavy and I felt helpless as I almost fell over to both sides in my brief trek across the tiny expanse.

“It just seems a tad extreme, even with the miraculous teaching results”, opined Vice Principal Hutchins, as he retired from the room, leaving me in the dubious care of Mr. Mathews.
14.title: Stacy tells her story

info.brief_description: Your high school has introduced a new technique to control the most unruly students.
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

A drug has been developed which, when taken, leaves you with the muscle control of a toddler, leaving you unable to speak, walk steadily or control your bladder and bowel. It however has no effect on your cognitive abilities, meaning that you remain completely aware of your condition.

In a secret, experimental programme, this drug has been distributed to various high schools for use in managing the behavior of the most disruptive students.
